mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.refresh_token, r.refresh_count, r.member_id, r.reg_date, r.mod_date, r.expiry_date, m.member_id AS memberNm FROM refresh_token r left join member m on r.member_id = m.id WHERE refresh_token = #{refreshToken}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO refresh_token ( refresh_token, refresh_count, member_id, reg_date, expiry_date ) VALUES ( #{refreshToken}, 1, #{memberId}, NOW(), #{expiryDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE refresh_token SET refresh_token = #{refreshToken}, refresh_count = refresh_count + 1, expiry_date = #{expiryDate}, mod_date = NOW() WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
